column1: what are the top 3 failed response codes in the last week?
column2: AppRequests| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) | where Success == false | summarize _count=sum(ItemCount) by ResultCode | top 3 by _count | sort by _count desc

column1: What are the 5 most common exceptions?
column2: AppExceptions | summarize _count=sum(ItemCount) by ExceptionType | top 5 by _count | sort by _count desc

column1: Which operations failed in the last day
column2: AppRequests | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | summarize failedCount=sumif(ItemCount, Success == false) by OperationName

column1: Failed operations in the past day and how many users were impacted
column2: AppRequests | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where Success == false | summarize impactedUsers=dcount(User_Id) by OperationName

column1: Count exceptions by outer message and operation and role
column2: AppExceptions | summarize count() by OuterMessage, OperationName, AppRoleName

column1: What are the 5 most common exceptions?
column2: AppExceptions | summarize _count=sum(ItemCount) by ExceptionType | top 5 by _count | sort by _count desc

column1: Failed operations in the past day and how many users were impacted
column2: AppRequests | where TimeGenerated > ago(1d) | where Success == false | summarize impactedUsers=dcount(User_Id) by OperationName
